text: Leicester Road Football Club is a football club based in Hinckley, England. Formed on 4 November 2013 after the liquidation of Hinckley United the previous month, they are currently members of the and play at the Leicester Road Stadium. ==History== When Hinckley United folded in October 2013, two clubs were formed to replace them. Leicester Road were established on 4 November 2013.Leicester Road Football Club Limited Companies House The new club was accepted into Division Two of the newly formed Midland League for the 2014–15 season. They were runners-up in their first season, earning promotion to Division One, where they would play Hinckley AFC for the first time.Countdown to derby day for Leicester Road and Hinckley AFC The Hinckley Times, 19 November 2015 In 2016–17 the club won the Leicestershire and Rutland Senior Cup, beating Holwell Sports 2–1 in the final.LRFC lift county cup!
